name: nasa
description: This is a full-stack project developed  for scheduling a mission launch for interstellar travel to one of the Kepler Exoplanets. The project combines a front-end application built with React and Arwes UI framework, and a back-end built with Node.js, Express, and MongoDB.

scripts.install-all: npm run install-server && npm run install-client
scripts.dev: start /B npm run server & start /B npm run client
scripts.deploy: npm run build --prefix client && npm run dev --prefix server
scripts.deploy-cluster: npm run build --prefix client && npm run cluster --prefix server
scripts.test: npm run test --prefix server && npm run test --prefiix client
